alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 16 at 4:47AM PDT until April 16 at 2:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 1500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 1500 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1, or by visiting online at https://tripcheck.com for Oregon or https://wsdot.com/travel for Washington.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
